resources.string: The mine is filled with hidden treasures: swords to kill the monsters and food to heal you. You start with 4 lives.
Honeydew got lost in the mine! Your goal is to find a special tile hidden in the map before your score reaches zero. You have treasures hidden in the map to help you on the way.
Good old minesweeper. One life, no treasures.
You emptied the mine. Go and build something great!
You rescued your friend. Well done!
Your friend starved waiting for you. Hurry the next time!
A zombie ate your delicious brains!
You shouldn\'t have gazed upon the Enderman
and all your stuff got eaten by a giant rabbit!
Ouch! Flag in a wrong place
Psss... boom! Creeper crept up on you
Ouch... should not have gaze upon the Enderman
Collect one more diamond ore to get a sword.
You have crafted a diamond sword!
You have killed a creeper and crafted a TNT!! Be careful.
You found a map! An area close to you was uncovered.
You found some beef and had a feast!
You found some cake. It was very sweet.
You killed a zombie. He was no match for you.
You killed a creeper and made a TNT out of the gunpowder it dropped.
You slayed an Enderman with a sword.
Sword is not a pickaxe, thus it broke.
If you like this app you can motivate us by giving a 5 star rating and a comment in Android Market. Thank you!

Puzzle game based on minesweeper game with a new twist. We also have MineCraft theme since we love the original game!
Disclaimer: This game is developed independently from Microsoft and Mojang. This game is also not related to the Minecraft game apart from similar theme.
The game include three game modes: - Classic for the lovers of original minesweeper game. - Adventure explore very large map where we hidden treasures through the map. You have four lives and can replenish them by discovering food. Your goal is to open all the hidden tiles, but it will not be easy. - Rescue you have to save your friend lost somewhere in the map before the time runs out. Hurry!
Other features: - Highsores via Google Play - compete wit your friends - Pinch to zoom - Multiple themes - Frustration free
